title: El Cactus
subtitle: The Cactus
meta_desc: Learn cactus vocabulary in Spanish with audio. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, plants desert Spanish, bilingual children books

pages.title: El Cactus
pages.prompt: A tall realistic saguaro cactus in the Arizona desert, blue sky and mountains, professional nature photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El cactus tiene espinas.
pages.prompt: Close-up of a realistic cactus showing sharp spines clearly, detailed texture, professional botanical photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El cactus guarda agua.
pages.prompt: A thick realistic cactus in the desert showing its plump water-storing body, professional nature photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El cactus tiene flores.
pages.prompt: A realistic cactus blooming with beautiful bright pink and yellow flowers, professional botanical photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El cactus vive en el desierto.
pages.footer: The cactus lives in the desert.
pages.prompt: Realistic desert landscape with multiple cacti, sandy terrain, mountains in distance, Arizona desert, professional landscape photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El cactus es fuerte.
pages.prompt: A tall realistic saguaro cactus standing strong in harsh desert sun, resilient and powerful, professional nature photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.
